item.title: About
item.description: About I’m Allan. I’ve held roles in Hardware, Ops and QA. I’m passionate about all things Hardware and Software. Due to my interests, I consider myself a jack of all trades - a master of some. Looking forward to sharing knowledge and collaborating with you.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact You my contact me over Twitter, LinkedIn or email.
